title: NCC Said in Talks to Sell Industry Unit to CRH-Heidelberg Group
description: Nordic construction firm NCC AB is in advanced talks to sell its industry business to a consortium including CRH Plc and Heidelberg Materials AG, two of the world’s biggest building materials companies, according to people familiar with the matter.
